data.title: Statement of persons nominated, notice of poll and polling stations - July 2024
data.text:
Election of a Member of Parliament for the Bognor Regis and Littlehampton Constituency

Notice is hereby given that:

1. A poll for the election of a Member of Parliament for Bognor Regis and Littlehampton Constituency will be held on

Thursday 4 July 2024, between the hours of 7:00 am and 10:00 pm.

2. One Member of Parliament is to be elected.

3. The names, home addresses and descriptions of the Candidates remaining validly nominated for election and the

names of all persons signing the Candidates nomination paper are as follows:
